title: UIC Design 2020 Year End Show | UIC - School of Design
contents: Skip to main content            Home           What is design?  Why UIC?  See student work  Admissions        News  Calendar  Partners  Support our school        About Director's message  Mission  Advisory board   Programs Bachelor of Design  BA in Design  Master of Design   People Faculty  Staff  Opportunities   Information for Current students  Faculty/Staff         You are here Home              Calendar    Recent Events  Archive     UIC Design 2020 Year End Show  The UIC School of Design is proud to announce our first online Year End Show to launch at 5:00p on Friday, May 8.    UIC DESIGN YES 2020  features works completed in the Master of Design (MDes Graphic Design / MDes Industrial Design), Bachelor of Design (BDes Graphic Design / BDes Industrial Design), and Bachelor of Arts in Design Studies degree programs.    We thank the invited professional jurors and UIC Design alumni for their participation in the undergraduate student awards program. Honorees of these awards are indicated on the site and our soon-to-graduate students invite feedback on their work from all who visit the site.    Please join us in celebrating the UIC Design class of 2020!
